title: Inpatient States
description: Retrieves the abbreviations of states available for inpatient charge queries.

title: Inpatient Cities
description: Retrieves the names of cities available within a state for inpatient charge queries.

title: Diagnosis-Related Groups
description: Retrieves the diagnosis-related groups available within a geographic region for inpatient charge queries.

title: Inpatient Charges
description: Retrieves the hospital charge data for a region associated with the specified state, city, and diagnoisis-related group.

title: Outpatient States
description: Retrieves the abbreviations of states available for outpatient charge queries.

title: Outpatient Cities
description: Retrieves the names of cities available within a state for outpatient charge queries.

title: Ambulatory Payment Classifications
description: Retrieves the ambulatory payment classifications available within a geographic region for outpatient charge queries.

title: Outpatient Charges
description: Retrieves the hospital charge data for a region associated with the specified state, city, and ambulatory payment classification.
